article.title: A New Beginning
article.author: David Li
article.excerpt: The first post on my site, and the first of my blog.

authors.bio: Software Engineer @aws, dreamer, adventurer, and always seeking the next challenge. Available for friendship and candid conversations. All writings are purely for fun.
